problem: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠BAC=90°,将△ABC绕点A顺时针旋转90°后得到△AB′C′(点B的对应点是点B′,点C的对应点是点C′),连接CC′.若∠CC′B′=32°,则∠AC′B′的大小是()
answer: 解:∵△ABC绕点A顺时针旋转90°后得到△AB'C',∴AC=AC',∠B=∠AB'C,∠CAC'=90°,∴△ACC为等腰直角三角形,∴∠ACC'=∠AC'C=45°,∵∠CC'B'=32°∴∠AC'B'=∠AC'C-∠CC'B'=45°-32°=13°,∴∠B=13°故答案选:C.
comment: 本题考查了旋转的性质:对应点到旋转中心的距离相等;对应点与旋转中心所连线段的夹角等于旋转角;旋转前、后的图形全等.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠BAC = N_0, rotate △ABC clockwise around point A by N_1 to obtain △AB′C′ (the corresponding point of point B is point B′, and the corresponding point of point C is point C ′), connect CC′. If ∠CC′B′ = N_2, then the size of ∠AC′B′ is ()
